services.title: Our Web Design Services
services.subtitle: We offer modern, customized solutions to enhance your online presence, tailored to the needs of local businesses and entrepreneurs with a professional and clean approach.

ourServices.title: Web Design
ourServices.text: We design and develop responsive websites that reflect your brand identity. Our sites are fast, modern, and optimized for all devices to ensure the best user experience.

ourServices.title: Digital Marketing
ourServices.text: Our marketing strategies help you reach your target audience effectively. We combine SEO, social media campaigns, and analytics to drive growth and improve your online visibility.

ourServices.title: Branding & Identity
ourServices.text: We create compelling brand identities that communicate your values and differentiate you from competitors. From logos to full visual systems, we make your brand unforgettable.

sectionOne.title: Real results
sectionOne.text: We focus on strategies that drive your growth, not just on aesthetics.

sectionTwo.title: Personalized approach
sectionTwo.text: Every project is unique. We guide you step by step with close and dedicated attention.

sectionThree.title: Trust and reliability
sectionThree.text: We meet deadlines, protect your brand, and guarantee continuous support.

about.title: About Our Company
about.subtitle: We are a team of passionate professionals dedicated to creating digital solutions that help businesses grow.

story.title: Who We Are
story.description: Founded in 2015, our company has been delivering innovative web design, marketing, and branding solutions. We focus on modern, clean, and user-friendly experiences.
story.subtitle: Our mission is to help local businesses and entrepreneurs establish a strong online presence while maintaining a professional and trustworthy image.

members.name: Alberto Gandoy Florido
members.description:
Alberto is a professional with extensive experience in software development and technology consulting, having worked at companies such as Accenture, Sogeti, Knowmad Mood, and currently Globant.
He specializes in managing and developing high-impact projects, ensuring quality, efficiency, and scalable solutions.
Passionate about programming and innovation, he combines technical knowledge with a perfectionist approach.

members.name: David Ramirez
members.job: Director of Content Creation, Video & Photography
members.description:
Passionate about audiovisual content creation, he combines photography, video, and storytelling to convey ideas in a unique way.
He is the creator of his own brand, Feelmar, where he develops personal and professional projects that reflect his style and vision.
His passion for creativity and innovation drives him to constantly explore new techniques and trends, ensuring that each project is impactful and authentic.
